oracleReaderQuery.value:
select FLD_PSCH_ITEM_NO , FLD_PSCH_SAL_ORD_NO ,FLD_PSCH_SEQ_NO , FLD_PSCH_Q_OPER_TYPE,FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO  from (select   FLD_PSCH_ITEM_NO , FLD_PSCH_SAL_ORD_NO ,FLD_PSCH_SEQ_NO ,   FLD_PSCH_Q_OPER_TYPE,FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO  from scm_admin.bpcsequencing						
minus						
select   FLD_PSCH_ITEM_NO , FLD_PSCH_SAL_ORD_NO ,FLD_PSCH_SEQ_NO ,  FLD_PSCH_Q_OPER_TYPE,FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO  from scm_admin.esb_bpcsequencing) where rownum <= '1000'

text.value: update SCM_ADMIN.ESB_BPCSEQUENCINGset ESBSTATUS = 'E' where ESBUPDATETIME = 'current date & time' - yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S

oracleReaderQuery.value:
WITH FirstQuery AS (
    SELECT FLD_PSCH_ITEM_NO, FLD_PSCH_SAL_ORD_NO, FLD_PSCH_SEQ_NO, FLD_PSCH_Q_OPER_TYPE, FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO
    FROM (
        SELECT FLD_PSCH_ITEM_NO, FLD_PSCH_SAL_ORD_NO, FLD_PSCH_SEQ_NO, FLD_PSCH_Q_OPER_TYPE, FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO
        FROM scm_admin.bpcsequencing
        MINUS
        SELECT FLD_PSCH_ITEM_NO, FLD_PSCH_SAL_ORD_NO, FLD_PSCH_SEQ_NO, FLD_PSCH_Q_OPER_TYPE, FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO
        FROM scm_admin.esb_bpcsequencing
    )
    WHERE ROWNUM <= 1000
)
SELECT
    NVL(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_PLAN_PROCESS_TIME, 0) AS FLD_PSCH_PLAN_PROCESS_TIME,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_REC_TYPE_OBSOLETE), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_REC_TYPE_OBSOLETE,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_SAL_FG_UOM), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_SAL_FG_UOM,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_MATL_NO), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_MATL_NO,
    NVL(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_SEQ_NO, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_SEQ_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_CUST_DESC), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_CUST_DESC,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_NXT_WRK_CTR), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_NXT_WRK_CTR,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_PROD_GROUP), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_PROD_GROUP,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_ENG_DWG_NO), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_ENG_DWG_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_DEPNT_REQ_FLAG), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_DEPNT_REQ_FLAG,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_MSG_ID), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_MSG_ID,
    NVL(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_PRODN_QTY_PCS, 0) AS FLD_PSCH_PRODN_QTY_PCS,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_PLAN_PRODN_SHIFT), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_PLAN_PRODN_SHIFT,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_ITEM_NO), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_ITEM_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_RUN_NO), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_RUN_NO,
    NVL(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_SAL_FG_QTY, 0) AS FLD_PSCH_SAL_FG_QTY,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_PLAN_PRODN_DATE), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_PLAN_PRODN_DATE,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_SHAPE_CODE_ID), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_SHAPE_CODE_ID,
    NVL(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_PLAN_SETUP_TIME, 0) AS FLD_PSCH_PLAN_SETUP_TIME,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_INDEPNT_ITEM), 0) AS FLD_PSCH_INDEPNT_ITEM,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_SAL_ORD_NO), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_SAL_ORD_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_CUST_ID), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_CUST_ID,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_INDEPNT_MATL_NO), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_INDEPNT_MATL_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_SHIP_TO_DESC), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_SHIP_TO_DESC,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_Q_CREATE_DATE), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_CREATE_DATE,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_Q_END_TIME), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_END_TIME,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_Q_ISRELEASE), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_ISRELEASE,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_Q_MODIFY_DATE), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_MODIFY_DATE,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_Q_OPER_TYPE), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_OPER_TYPE,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_Q_RELEASE_DATE), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_RELEASE_DATE,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_PRODN_ORD_NO), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_PRODN_ORD_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO,
    NVL(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_Q_SEQ_NO, 0) AS FLD_PSCH_Q_SEQ_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_PLAN_WRK_CTR), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_PLAN_WRK_CTR,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_Q_START_TIME), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_START_TIME,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_Q_PRODN_ORD_NO), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_PRODN_ORD_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_TAG_ID_FROM), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_TAG_ID_FROM,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_TAG_ID_TO), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_TAG_ID_TO,
    NVL(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_UOPQUANTITY, 0) AS FLD_PSCH_UOPQUANTITY,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_UOPQUANTITYUOM), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_UOPQUANTITYUOM,
    NVL(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_PU_NR_OF_OPERATION, 0) AS FLD_PSCH_PU_NR_OF_OPERATION,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_RELEASE_CODE), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_RELEASE_CODE,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_LOADING_START), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_LOADING_START,
    NVL(TRIM(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_LOADING_END), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_LOADING_END,
    NVL(PSCH.REC_ID, 0) AS REC_ID
FROM
    scm_admin.BPCSEQUENCING PSCH
JOIN 
    FirstQuery FQ ON PSCH.FLD_PSCH_ITEM_NO = FQ.FLD_PSCH_ITEM_NO
                 AND PSCH.FLD_PSCH_SAL_ORD_NO = FQ.FLD_PSCH_SAL_ORD_NO
                 AND PSCH.FLD_PSCH_SEQ_NO = FQ.FLD_PSCH_SEQ_NO
                 AND PSCH.FLD_PSCH_Q_OPER_TYPE = FQ.FLD_PSCH_Q_OPER_TYPE
                 AND PSCH.FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO = FQ.FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO
WHERE
    LENGTH(PSCH.FLD_PSCH_RELEASE_CODE) > 0
    AND PSCH.FLD_PSCH_Q_ISRELEASE = 'Y';
